description.en: Kaname Isurugi, who suffered facial injuries in an accident, has a hard time getting along with the people at his school ever since he entered. When school counselor Sugata asks Kaname to help solve the problems of the girls in his charge, Kaname half-heartedly makes contact with four of them. After a month passes without any response, Kaname begins to question his actions. Suddenly, Kaname has a shocking "fateful encounter".
description.ja: 事故が原因で顔に傷が残り、周りから距離をとられてしまっている高校生、石動かなめ。ある日、スクールカウンセラーの須賀田鳥子に半ば言いくるめられるように、彼女の仕事を手伝わされることになってしまう。４人の女子生徒と交流することになりこれまでと違った日々を送るかなめの背中に、突然、カッターナイフを突きつけられる。訳も解らず拘束されるかなめに対し、仮面の少女は驚きの告白をして――。

description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

---

description.pt-br: Depois de postar um “Melhor Comentário”, de alguma forma eu me tornei o personagem principal de uma webtoon!

altTitles.ja: みょーちゃん先生はかく語りき

description.en: Sasafune Miyoko, the nurse at a certain high school, is often asked for advice by the students. Almost every day someone comes to ask her about their worries, and this and that… But since these are high school students going through puberty, helping them is usually not that simple! Myō-chan-sensei is hard at work answering questions that are sure to make you blush like "Have you ever had sex outdoors?" or "I wonder which panties my boyfriend likes more".
description.ja:
生徒のためならなんでもシちゃう？熱血ポンコツ教師・みょーちゃん登場☆

とある高校の保健室の先生・笹舟みよかは生徒達の良き相談役として、今日も思春期爆発系質問にカラダを張って答えます！アオカンしたいって彼氏に言われた？ 乳輪が大きいのが悩み？全部みょーちゃん先生にお任せあれ！！！
description.ru: К Сасафунэ Миёко, медсестре одной средней школы, часто обращаются ученики за советом. Почти каждый день кто-нибудь приходит спросить ее о своих проблемах, о том, о сем... Но поскольку речь идет о старшеклассниках, переживающих период полового созревания, помочь им обычно не так-то просто! Мио-тян-сэнсэй усердно отвечает на вопросы, которые наверняка заставят вас покраснеть, например: «Занимались ли вы когда-нибудь сексом на улице?» или «Интересно, какие трусики больше нравятся моему парню?».

description.en: Sayeon Lee despises Aberrants. They wreak havoc on society with their strange, unthinkable powers. It's just too bad she happens to be an Aberrant herself! Forced to fend for her life in the deadly Aberrant Corps, she's determined to make it to the top, and her unusual ability should help her -- if she can figure out how to use it in time.

altTitles.en: A Place with You in It

title.en: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru

altTitles.ja: 愚かな天使は悪魔と踊る

altTitles.en: The Foolish Angel Dances with the Devil

altTitles.ru: Неразумный ангел в пляске с демонами | Неразумный ангел в танце с демоном

altTitles.vi: Thiên sứ Ngu muội Nhảy múa cùng Ác ma
天使愚眛趂𦨂共恶魔 (Nom Script)
Vũ điệu của thiên thần ngốc nghếch và ác quỷ

description.en: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
description.ja: 堕落した悪魔たちにやる気を出させるため悪魔たちのアイドルとなる人間を捜しに人間界に降りてきた阿久津雅虎。彼は早くもアイドル候補・天音リリーを見つけ勧誘する。しかし、リリーの正体は阿久津たち悪魔の天敵の「天使」で!? 自らの身と仲間を守るためリリーを堕天させんとする阿久津と野望のため阿久津の更正を決意する
description.pt: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe - todo o caminho desde o Inferno, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!
description.pt-br: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe -todo o caminho desde o Infernio, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!

altTitles.en: Ugly Duckling of the Entertainment District

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng xấu xí ở Phố Đèn Đỏ

description.en:
An abandoned high school girl becomes an Oiran in a strange world—

Esora, a high school girl who lost her place, found herself in an unknown red light district. She was sold to a slave buyer at the Yukaku "Sagamiya". The owner, Sagami, told her that Ishe could be the number one Oiran there.
description.ja: 居場所を失った女子高生エソラは、気がつくと知らない花街にいた。人買いに売られやってきたのは、遊郭「相模屋」。その主人である相模に、ここで1番の花魁になれると言われ―。幻想的な世界観で描かれる異世界花魁物語。
description.vi:
Một nữ sinh trung học bị bỏ rơi trở thành Oiran (kỹ nữ cao cấp) ở một thế giới xa lạ—
Esora, một nữ sinh trung học bị mất chỗ ở, thấy mình đang ở một khu đèn đỏ vô danh. Cô bị bán cho một người mua nô lệ ở Phố đèn đỏ "Sagamiya". Người chủ, Sagami, nói với cô rằng nếu cô trở thành Oiran thì sẽ có thể làm lại cuộc đời.

altTitles.vi: Người đàn ông không thể ly hôn CASE 2

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

description.en: A lonely old painter and a girl with no friends. This is a story about two people who don't fit in, and how they learn how to love the world as it is.

altTitles.th: ร้อยเรียงรักไปกับเธอ

description.en:
Shizuku Hoshikawa, a high school girl who lives avoiding contact with people, writes a novel which is accidentally read by her classmate Kaori Asaka.  
She loves it but finds out Hoshikawa wasn't planning to write anymore due to lack of ideas, to which she ends up saying:  
"Let's start going out, you and me… You can write a story about our own love."
description.tl: Ang mahiyain na si Shizuku Hoshikawa ay patungo sa pagtatapon ng kanyang una at huling nobela. Ngunit bago niya ito magawa, nabangga siya ng karismatikong si Kaori Asaka at nauwi ang nobela sa bahay nito. Ang pangyayaring ito ay labis na nagdulot ng pagkabalisa kay Shizuku, dahil ayaw niyang mabasa ng kahit sino ang malungkot na kwentong isinulat niya para sa kanyang sariling kasiyahan.
description.zh-hk: 個性內向的少女星川雫，偷偷地在寫百合小說。原本她打算寫完這篇小說之後，就要結束自己的性命。但就在她把小說的草稿，拿到學校的垃圾場去丟掉時，遇到了同班的朝香夏織。夏織是一位跟她完全不同的少女，而那份小說的草稿，卻被夏織撿走了。原本她以為夏織看完自己寫的小說之後會嘲笑她，沒想到夏織卻說非常的感動，還說想看她寫戀愛小說。小雫原本是以沒有想寫的題材為藉口來推托掉，沒想到夏織卻提議兩個人交往，並且透過這個體驗，來寫下屬於她們的戀愛小說！

title.en: Saki-chan wa Konya mo Peko Peko

altTitles.ja: サキちゃんは今夜もぺこぺこ

altTitles.es-la: Saki la súcubo está hambrienta esta noche

description.en: Saki-chan is a beautiful young woman and just a little naive. She may seem harmless as she wanders the streets, but beware–she’s a brand-new succubus who thrives on the lust of men! She’s just…not very good at it yet. When she finds herself with an opportunity to move in with a 30-something man who’s never slept with a woman before, she takes it, just like she’ll take him! Er, eventually. This sweet and sexy comedy about a novice sex demon and her virgin partner will leave you satisfied but always hungry for more.
description.id: Saki adalah gadis yang cantik dan sedikit polos. Dia mungkin tampak tak berbahaya ketika berada di jalan, namun sesungguhnya dia adalah succubus baru yang mencari nafsu laki-laki! Dia… belum bagus dalam hal itu. Akhirnya dia punya kesempatan untuk tinggal bersama laki-laki umur 30-an yang masih perjaka. Ini adalah cerita komedi yang manis dan seksi antara demon seks pemula dan rekan perjakanya yang akan membuatmu puas dan meminta lebih. Dijamin!
description.ja: アパートの前で行き倒れていた巨乳×天然系美少女は、ウブでピュアな新米サキュバスだった！？　彼女は精を吸収しなければならない困った体質で同居することになったオーバー30の童貞男子には、うれしくもキビしー状況に！！
description.es-la: Saki-chan es una joven hermosa y un poco ingenua. Puede parecer inofensiva mientras deambula por las calles, pero ten cuidado: ¡es una súcubo novata que se nutre de la lujuria de los hombres! Aunque todavía no es muy buena en el negocio. Cuando se encuentra con la oportunidad de mudarse con un hombre de treinta y tantos años que nunca antes se había acostado con una mujer, no puede desperdiciarla.

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

title.en: Kanojo ni shitai Joshi Ichii, no Tonari de Mitsuketa Amari-chan

altTitles.ja: 彼女にしたい女子一位、の隣で見つけたあまりちゃん

description.en:
"A Romantic Comedy Starting from Friendship with the Hidden Heroine Only I Know About."

He’s a nice guy, but way too plain… That’s Fukusuke Mogi, who secretly admires Kureha Yui, the most beautiful girl in the class.
However, the one rumored to be with Yui is his best friend, Fujisaki Yusei, the ace of the basketball team.

Feeling down about being a "mob character" overshadowed by his best friend, Fukusuke discovers another super cute girl who’s hidden in Yui’s shadow and doesn’t stand out—Usuba Amari!

"W-Would you… be my friend?"

Sharing similar circumstances, Fukusuke and Amari decide to practice "becoming normal" together—what could possibly happen next?
description.id: "Kisah Romantis Komedi Dimulai dari Persahabatan dengan Heroine Tersembunyi yang Hanya Aku Tahu."Dia anak baik, tapi terlalu biasa saja… Itulah Fukusuke Mogi, yang diam-diam mengagumi Kureha Yua, gadis tercantik di kelas.Namun, orang yang digosipkan bersama Yui adalah sahabatnya, Fujisaki Yuusei, bintang tim basket. Saat merasa terpuruk karena menjadi "karakter figuran" yang tenggelam di balik sahabatnya, Fukusuke menemukan seorang gadis super imut lainnya, yang tersembunyi di balik bayang-bayang Yua dan jarang diperhatikan—Usuha Amari!"A-Apakah… kamu mau jadi temanku?"Berbagi nasib yang serupa, Fukusuke dan Amari memutuskan untuk mulai berlatih "menjadi orang biasa" bersama—kira-kira apa yang akan terjadi selanjutnya?
description.es-la:
Fukusuke, un chico agradable pero un poco aburrido, se enamora a primera vista de Yua, la chica más hermosa de la clase. Sin embargo, se rumorea que Yua está interesada en Yusei, el amigo de la infancia de Fukusuke y la estrella del equipo de baloncesto. 

Fukusuke suspira por un amor imposible. Pero, un día, Fukusuke descubre a una chica adorable, llamada Amari Usuha, que es tímida y se esconde tras la sombra de Yua. "Um, ¿quieres ser mi amigo?" Y entonces, los dos empiezan a practicar juntos para "ser normales", pero... "¿Es cierto que Amari-chan está enamorada de Yusei?" "......." "¿Por qué te sonrojas tanto?" 

Una comedia romántica que comienza con amistad, entre un chico aburrido y una chica secretamente adorable, solamente conocida por él. 
(Un pequeño manga para promocionar la novela)
description.pt-br:
Fukusuke, um garoto simpático, mas um pouco chato, se apaixona à primeira vista por Yua, a garota mais linda da turma. No entanto, há rumores de que Yua está interessada em Yusei, amigo de infância de Fukusuke e estrela do time de basquete.

Fukusuke anseia por um amor impossível. Mas, um dia, Fukusuke descobre uma garota adorável, chamada Amari Usuha, que é tímida e se esconde atrás da sombra de Yua. "Hum, você quer ser meu amigo?" E então, os dois começam a praticar juntos para “ser normais”, mas... “É verdade que Amari-chan está apaixonada por Yusei?” "....." "Por que você está corando tanto?"

Uma comédia romântica que começa com uma amizade, entre um garoto chato e uma garota secretamente adorável, que só ele conhece.

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament... His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He'll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he's human... Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ja: 両親の私欲で悪魔に売られた不憫な少年・入間くん。孫のいない悪魔に溺愛されて悪魔の学校に通うことになり!?
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

title.en: Ochikobore Shiro Madoushi Cecil wa Taishougai no Hazu deshita

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ白魔導士セシルは対象外のはずでした

altTitles.zh: 菜鸟白魔法师塞西尔本非我爱

altTitles.zh-hk: 菜鳥白魔法師塞西爾本非我愛

description.en: During a party, Cecil, a clumsy white mage, spills on Oswald, the popular leader of the first squadron of holy knights, a homemade antidote. The reason is that he emitted a strong evil aura. An upset Oswald kidnaps her an takes her to his mansion, and she panics: "My chastity is in danger! Cecil grows impatient, but he rebuffs her, telling her: "You are not to my liking". It seems that Oswald is behind Cecil's potion, which was the first to take effect on a curse he had received in the past. Oswald formally asks Cecil to treat him, and she decides to take the opportunity to make a name for herself and accepts the request...
description.ja: 落ちこぼれの白魔導士セシルはパーティの最中、社交界人気ナンバーワンの第一聖騎士隊隊長オズワルドにお手製の解毒薬をぶっかけてしまう。その理由は、彼から強烈な邪気が放たれていたから。不機嫌なオズワルドに彼の屋敷まで拉致され「貞操の危機!?」と焦るセシルだが、「お前は趣味じゃない」と一蹴される。どうやら彼の目的は、過去に受けた呪いに初めて効果があったというセシルの薬のようで――!?オズワルドから正式に治療の依頼を受けたセシルは、功績を残すチャンス！と引き受けることにするが……。

title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
description.ja: 無為な日々を過ごす天童蒼馬には二人の『推し』がいる。ネットの『推し』大人気VTuberのアンリエッタ。リアルの『推し』アイドル声優の八住ひより。二人への推し活を生きがいに大学生活を送るはずが……なんと隣の部屋に『推し』の一人が引っ越してきて!?夢のような展開に胸を躍らせる蒼馬だったが、目の当たりにしたのは残念すぎる『推し』の本性で――。
description.vi: Vtuber nhà rác... Seiyuu Idol bợm rượu... Bạn thuở nhỏ Yandere... Ai sẽ là người chiến thắng

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.ja: 幼い頃、父の魔法の様な落語に魅せられた朱音は、父のある一席を機に自身も噺家としての道を歩み始める。17歳になった朱音が目指すのは落語界の最高位「真打」になること――。一流の技量を習得するため、様々な試練が朱音を待ち受け…!?
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

altTitles.es: Alya a veces me susurra en ruso

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

description.en:
War of the Holy Grail—Pursuing the power of the "Holy Grail" which grants a miracle, this is a contest in which seven magi summon seven Heroic Spirits to compete for it. In that battle whose conclusion was postponed three times, now, the fourth war commenced again. Entrusting their dearest wish of victory, the magi joined the battleground called "Fuyuki," but amongst them, there was a man who was always alone, and could not find out the meaning behind his fights. His name was Kotomine Kirei. Not comprehending the guidance of fate, Kirei was lost, and had kept questioning. Why someone like his was given the Command Seals. However, the fate of his fights crossed Kirei's path with a nemesis by chance. That person is—Emiya Kiritsugu. A man who was sterner than anyone else, more merciless than anyone else, and who sought the miracle of the Holy Grail.  
  
Merely recited in fragments in Fate/stay night, this is the Fourth War of the Holy Grail 10 years ago. The truth which unfolded behind the battle between Shirou's foster father, Rin's father, and the younger Kotomine Kirei, is finally revealed…
description.ru: Участниками Пятой войны за Святой Грааль были дети, и тем не менее противостояние мастеров было жестоким и кровопролитным. Но какие же ужасы явятся миру, если за дело примутся взрослые, опытные волшебники, принимающие холодные решения даже в отношении собственных родственников и любимых? Четвертая война разобьет много сердец и разрушит множество жизней. На поле боя сойдутся очень разные люди - от учащегося в Ассоциации до городского маньяка. Но кому же из них будет суждено добраться до Грааля и исполнить свою мечту?

title.en: Lalalab☆ ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun to!~

altTitles.ja: ラララボ☆ ～ギャルと科学と青春と！～

altTitles.en: Lala Lab ⭐︎ Gyaru, Science, and Youth!

altTitles.vi: Lalalab☆ ~Gyaru, Khoa Học, và Thanh Xuân!~

description.en: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy, but don’t be fooled—she’s a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence, she’s got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Hanako Naito, and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together, they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes, steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave, and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ☆
description.ja: 水沢ララは、ギャルい見た目とハイテンションで誤解されがちだけど、“偉大な科学者”を目指すガチ理系の大学3年生(理学部生物学科)！大きすぎる目標に自信喪失する日もあるけど、オタク気質のお嬢様・内藤花恋、パジャマ登校のずぼらっ子・毒島ときという個性豊かな研究室仲間と、菌が増えて喜んだり、高圧蒸気滅菌器で芋を蒸かしたり…キャンパスライフ（？）だって満喫中☆
description.vi: Lala Mizasawa nhìn có vẻ là một bé gyaru siêu lấp lánh và năng động nhưng thực chất ẻm là một con nerd khoa học sinh viên năm ba khoa sinh với giấc mơ trở thành một nhà khoa học siêu đỉnh chóp! Dẫu cho ước mơ cao vời vợi có lúc làm ẻm hơi lo lắng, em ấy luôn có những người bạn cùng lab siêu dị ở cạnh bên động viên tiếp bước: một Hanako Naito lịch lãm mà quý bửu và một Toki Busujima lười biếng lúc nào cũng chỉ mặc đồ ngủ. Họ sẽ cùng nhau tận hưởng cuộc sống nghiên cứu trên trường siêu vui siêu hỗn loạn (nuôi vi khuẩn, hấp khoai lang trong autoclave (?), vân vân mây mây...)

title.en: 100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death
100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

title.en: I Became the Demon King's Right Hand so I'm Corrupting the Story

altTitles.en: I Became the Demon King’s Right Hand so I Will Alter the Original Story

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou no Migiude ni Nattanode Gensaku Kaiaku Shimasu

altTitles.ja: 魔王の右腕になったので原作改悪します

description.en: Office Lady falls from a building is reincarnated into another world and ends up at the Devil Kings castle. Can she save him from the bad ending?

altTitles.ja: 気付いてしまった女の子

description.en: **Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/sakayama_shinta/status/1846747972878717310)

altTitles.ja: スカベンジャーズアナザースカイ

description.en: In the shadowy research facility known as 'Bus Stop,' a group of armed girls called 'Scavengers' operate. They are dispatched to mysterious realms referred to by the initials 'BP' (Black Parade), where treasures are said to sleep. But what lurks there are otherworldly ghosts...!? Explore! Defeat!! Collect!!! In a bid to gather one million dollars and earn their freedom, these girls embark on a life-threatening journey to scavenge!

altTitles.ja: スーパーコミック劇場 ラジアータ ストーリーズ

title.en: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shouki Desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ツンデレなわたくしが可愛いなんて正気ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shoki Desuka?

altTitles.en: Are You Serious Thinking a Tsundere Like Me Is Cute?

description.en:
Rose, a prideful and spoiled princess, is known for her arrogance and lack of charm, making her widely disliked. After a life-changing event, she decides to turn her life around and make amends for her past behavior. Her first step? Breaking off her engagement with her kind and supportive fiancé, Rein, to free him from being tied to someone like her.

However, to Rose's surprise, Rein doesn't react as she expects. Instead, he openly declares: "I can't help but find you irresistibly cute." Confused and flustered, Rose struggles to understand his feelings while grappling with her own emotions.

This romantic comedy explores themes of personal growth, self-worth, and unexpected love, all wrapped in the quirky charm of a tsundere protagonist.
description.ja:
わがままで傲慢で可愛げがない――嫌われ者の王女ローズはある出来事をきっかけに改心すると決意した。
手始めに婚約者のレインを自分から解放するため婚約破棄を言い渡す。しかし彼の返事は思いも寄らないもので……？
「生憎私には、あなたが可愛く思えて仕方ないのです」
あなた、正気ですか……！？

description.en:
Aki-san (50), a divorced woman, has been getting along well with Rokujo-san (60).
People around them are worried about their pure relationship, but there is no need to worry. At a summer festival, the two quickly grow closer, and their feelings for each other continue to grow.
They envision a future together, and finally....
"I want to spend the rest of my life with the person I love."
description.ru: Аки-сан (50 лет), разведённая женщина, хорошо проводит время с Рокудзё-саном (60 лет). Окружающие беспокоятся, но их отношения чисты, и беспокоиться не стоит. На летнем фестивале они быстро сближаются, и их чувства друг к другу продолжают расти. Они представляют себе совместное будущее, и, наконец... «Я хочу провести остаток жизни с любимым человеком».

description.en: In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.
Memes, gaming consoles, and websites turned into anime girls! Please enjoy this compilation of meme comics, oneshots, and shorts from the team behind Merryweather Comics!
description.pl: Memy z internetu zostały zmienione w słodkie anime dziewczynki.
description.pt:
(Brazilian) / Português(Brasil): ||Memes da internet se tornaram garotas fofas de anime, criado por Merryweather e com arte por Princess Hinghoi.||  


---

**Links:**  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Merryweatherey)  
[Author's Youtube (with Dubbed Comics)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvCtIO1it51jSkZGibS9R3w)
description.ru: Мемы из интернета, превращенные в милых анимешных девочек, создано Merryweather с иллюстрациями Princess Hinghoi.

description.en: The moment the company receives notice of a person subject to restructuring, With a roaring sound as if the sky had collapsed. And the world has changed. [The sale of this district has been decided.] [This will result in a workforce restructuring.] Restructuring for Lives Missions that you can capture to gain special powers If it's a miraculous prank, I'll do my best for it! "I found it. A way to live together." Restructuring candidate Lee Eunho's super-fast promotion starts now!

Mini 4WD Fighter, the iconic superhero of the Mini 4WD hobby! He loves the hobby just as much as the kids and shows his enthusiasm though his commentary through tournaments while cheering the racers in fair play.

title.en: The Diary About Ayame's Easygoing and Aggressive Days

altTitles.ja-ro: アヤメくんののんびり肉食日誌

description.en: The manga centers on Ayame and Tsubaki, who are researchers at a lab in the biology department of T University. Ayame is a "returnee." He does things at his own pace and is a "dinosaur otaku," and Tsubaki is his older colleague who is an enthusiast of studying the skeletons of birds and dinosaurs. The manga follows their slightly strange romantic relationship.

title.en: The Genius Wants to be Ordinary!

description.en:
The protagonist of a successful life recognized by the public, 'Son Jinhyuk.'
However, Jinhyuk just wanted to live a normal life with his beloved family, and he couldn't hide his lonely heart because he couldn't.
One day, I woke up in an accident and was back to the time I was 9 years old before I lost my parents, whom I wanted so much!
Will Jinhyuk be able to save his parents and live a normal life?

title.en: The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student

description.en:
Back in the Age of Despair, Kyle defeated Erebos, the genesis of evil.  Then 5000 years later, he reincarnated as Leo with the memories of his past life intact.

His comrades — the Brave Arron, the Divine Blacksmitsh Dweno, the Poet of the Stars Luna, and the Wise King Lysinas — were all heralded as great heroes.

But the 'Hero Record', a gift from the heavens that records the achievements of heroes through the ages, had no record of Kyle whatsoever, and the people of the present treat him like a fictional character.

Angry about the reality he's found himself in, Leo enrolls at Lumene Academy, the hero academy which houses the Hero Record.

"Fine. I guess I'll become an honors student to figure out why I was written out of history."

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

title.en: I Really Don't Want to Learn Forbidden Spells

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhēn Bù Xiǎng Xué Jìn Zhòu
Wo Zhen Bu Xiang Xue Jin Zhou

description.en:
For Ning Feng, an infamous underachiever, this will be his third time taking the awakening exam.  When he awakens as a one-star -- the lowest possible rating -- everyone laughs.  He can't understand why his new skills talk about "forbidden spells" and "dark power."  
He isn't an evil dark lord, but wow!  Who knew forbidden spells could be so powerful!  These skills are so cool, but they emit tons of dark power. 
There's a new source of dark power in the city and Ning Feng must get stronger before anyone realizes that its him.

title.en: I Got The Weakest Class, Dragon Tamer!?

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：驭龙师是最弱职业？

altTitles.zh-ro: Quánmín Zhuǎn Zhí: Yù Lóng Shī Shì Zuì Ruò Zhíyè?

description.en: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title.en: The Youngest Disciple of the Martial Arts Leader

description.en: The strongest in the martial world, leader of the Hojeongdan, Lee Hwan! During a mission, he battles the Heavenly Demon of the Demonic Sect, Deung Gwang-cheon, and loses consciousness… When he opens his eyes, he’s at home? No… This is my childhood home? It’s hard to believe, but if I really have returned to the past, this time I won’t just stand by and do nothing! On the night of August 8th, when he was 17 years old, a sudden, splitting headache strikes, and something comes to mind. “Cheonsu Ilgi Hap (Thousand Hands One Energy Unification), Deukwon Gang (Obtain Original Strength)…” He muttered absentmindedly and then paused. “Wait, this is the Absolute Demonic Art of the Heavenly Demon! How do I know this technique? Am I going crazy?!”

We may be like this, but if we don't give up, we will surely reach the dream stage, Koshien!"

Jyosei Private Academy. After it changed its policy and became a cut-throat academic elite school, its once powerful baseball team has become weak with only four members left. However, baseball maniac Ruito Hibino has a secret plan!

Aiming for Koshien is an amateur tag-team of misfits!?

Straight from the bottom of hell!

A straightforward tale of baseball played by hated people!

The sacred heavenly gate looms high in the boundless sky, while the abyss of time and space wreaks havoc upon the world. As twelve spiritual springs rise from the earth and the moon slips beyond humanity’s grasp… where will our destiny lead? The realm of gods? The domain of demons? No, this is a world that belongs to humanity! I will claim the crown that no one else dares to bear and rise as the king of a new era. My name is Ren Jie, and to live is to be extraordinary!

A hundred years ago, “Mostro” began invading Earth from a mysterious otherworldly space that suddenly opened. During the long battle, humans with special abilities emerged. They came to be known as “Heroes” and fought against the Mostro to protect the world…

"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
description.fr:
« Ça peut être d'un bleu brumeux, mais c'est pas grave. »

Se déroulant un an après l'épilogue de "Seasons of Blossom", cette histoire se concentre sur la nouvelle ouverture du « Café Blossom and NEMONE Atelier », ainsi que sur la nouvelle camarade de classe de Bomi, « Pureum », alors qu'ils explorent une nouvelle jeunesse. Romance sur le campus, amours après l'école, romance au bureau, il y a de tout. La série réconfortante revient avec une nouvelle histoire pleine de jeunesse !

description.en:
Secretary Seo Yujin is in charge of self proclaimed truth-finding. Once upon she receives a sudden call to her president and she hears shocking news. She is asked to take full care of the president's younger brother and the third son of an unknown conglomerate, Jin Taeoh. What if you add something like this when you can't shake off an eery feeling? "It's not that difficult. You just need to keep him out of the media."

She should have run away immediately after hearing that, but blinded by the money, Seo Yujin agrees...! The first time she goes to the airport to meet him her first impression was that he's a quite beautiful... beast? Tame the world's just but heartless psychotic beast who doesn't know where to go!

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

altTitles.en: A Rough Lady Is All Bothered

altTitles.ja: あらくれお嬢様はもんもんしている

altTitles.vi: Nàng Tiểu Thư Cộc Cằn Lại Lỡ Một Nhịp Rồi?!

description.en:
Meet Tsubaki Kuchinashi, the Manhater Prince. Beautiful and popular, Tsubaki's core strength in high school comes from her position as the principal's granddaughter - suffice it to say, but any student or teacher who even looks at her the wrong way could be expelled at a moment's notice.   
  
Meet Tadashi Kiritsu, the head of the Public Morals Committee. As sharp and rigid as his glasses, Tadashi despises Kuchinashi's iron grip on the school. Naturally, a challenge to her rule bothers Kuchinashi, so she decides to get rid of him as soon as possible. Her plan? Get him in a honey trap. However, that's easier said than done, as she starts finding hidden aspects of herself that she didn't want to acknowledge, either to herself or to Tadashi.  
  
Will she prevail before her conscience eats her up from her own salacious taunts? Will Tadashi play into her hands? What manner of a person will he prove himself to be when facing her taunts?
description.ja: 私ばっかりもんもんするのは絶対おかしい‥‥。目障りな風紀委員・起立匡史(きりつただし)を退学させるため、口無椿(くちなしつばき)お嬢様はご自分のお色気でヤツを陥れることに。ですが、ナイスバディなお嬢様のお色気が起立に全く効きません。逆に、椿様の方がもんもんしてしまうのです。
description.vi:
Xin giới thiệu Tsubaki Kuchinashi: nàng hoàng tử "hận đàn ong," cháu gái của hiệu trưởng trường cao trung nơi chụy đang học. Vì thế, Tsubaki vừa có tiền, vừa có quyền, lại được xã hội (trong trường) trọng vọng (và tất nhiên là xinh đẹp nữa rồi). Ai dám động thủ với chị ấy (học sinh hay giáo viên) thì sẽ được cho đi T**** H** ngay tắp lự.

Phía bên kia có Tadashi Kiritsu: Cầm đầu ủy ban kỉ luật của trường, thanh niên nghiêm túc dốc hết công sức mình cho công cuộc trị an ở trường. Cũng vì thế mà Tsubaki mới thấy anh này "ngứa mắt" kinh khủng và muốn cho anh này bị đuổi học cho nhẹ nợ.

Vậy làm sao để có thể đuổi học được nam chính của chúng ta? Tsubaki cứ nghĩ là làm tí "mật ngọt chết ruồi" để nhử Tadashi vào bẫy là sẽ chắc kèo thắng. Nhưng người tính đâu bằng trời tính, qua những cái bẫy này, nữ chính của ta lại dần dà khám phá ra được những khía cạnh mới của bản thân mình và Tadashi mà chị ấy khó lòng chấp nhận được...

Rồi Tsubaki sẽ cắn rứt lương tâm trước vì những trò chơi khăm của mình hay là Tadashi sẽ mắc vào bẫy trước đây?

description.en: Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…
description.pt-br: Você já se perguntou como é, de verdade, o garoto mais popular da escola? Acontece que ele pode ser tão desajeitado e tímido quanto qualquer um de nós. É o que Jayu Nam, uma garota discreta e reservada, começa a perceber depois de um encontro inesperado com Jahyeok Yeo, um colega de classe que parece ser bom em tudo na vida. Bem, quase tudo. Por trás do carisma de Jahyeok, esconde-se um super-introvertido que preferiria ficar em casa, mas sua aparência cativante sempre o empurra para situações sociais. Juntos, Jayu e Jahyeok começam a aprender um pouco sobre amizade e, quem sabe, algo mais…

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?
